sentences.english: Chapter 4 DC Metadata Application Projection Study It studies Nordic metadata project.
sentences.chinese: 第四章都柏林核心元數據應用項目研究。

sentences.english: That was one dent in the dam-like Berlin Wall, and a big one.
sentences.chinese: 柏林牆堤壩出現了凹陷，一個嚴重的凹陷。

sentences.english: Here, a woman sifts sand in bombed out Berlin in 1948.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲1948年一女性在被炸燬的柏林篩沙。

sentences.english: Berlin estimates it lost a record five million euros last year to fare dodgers.
sentences.chinese: 柏林估計它去年由於逃票人造成了五百萬英鎊的損失。

sentences.english: The fall of the belin wall marked the dawn of new era in European history.
sentences.chinese: 柏林牆的倒塌，標誌着歐洲新歷史的到來。

sentences.english: The forth episode of the coiled. riot, Eveline vividly demonstrates a kind of emotion paralysis in Dublin youngsters.
sentences.chinese: 生動地表現了都柏林青年人癱瘓的精神狀態。

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the 57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片獲第57屆柏林電影節最佳影片金熊獎。

sentences.english: Chinese Students & Scholars Society The Ohio State University …
sentences.chinese: 柏林洪堡大學中國學生指導手冊。

sentences.english: Hopefully my travels will take me back to Berlin one day, if it does, i will definately base myself at this hotel.
sentences.chinese: 希望我有一天能再回柏林，那時我一定還住這家酒店。

sentences.english: The wildest rumours were circulating in Berlin last night, adds Reuter.
sentences.chinese: 路透社還稱，昨晚在柏林有幾個謠言在廣泛流傳。

sentences.english: The first one is the construction of the Oberlin Student Center.
sentences.chinese: 其一，建構奧柏林學生活動中心。

sentences.english: Only then could the cement wall collapse in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 在當時，正是這一點註定了柏林牆的倒塌。

sentences.english: There is no crushing monumental axis leading into the stadium as there was in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 有沒有破碎氣壯山河的軸領導到大球場，因此在柏林。

sentences.english: Spoted target will not move for this.
sentences.chinese: 看到的飛越東柏林將不移動爲這。

sentences.english: Would you drive into Chamberlain with me?
sentences.chinese: 你和我一起開車去錢柏林，好嗎？
